review: Not only he never gave a receipt,he despite informing about a surgically constructed tooth under my crown ,broke it recklessly. Never apologized, showed arrogance or,proposed any refund. The cavity is only good for an implant now,since he broke the base on which a cap can be set. Complete lose of time and money. ** ** ***  *************** *********** ****** ********** ** ******** **** *********** ****** ******** On top the clinic was very very unhygienic.choose wisely.
